body.p:
Brandenburg
9th Septr 1864
To His Excellency
Tho. E. Bramlett
Gov State of Ky.

I herewith enclose you for your consideration affidavit and Petition of John Shuman a peacible Citizen of our County, the affidavit truly sets out the circumstances and state of facts. He did not want to burthen you with a long list of Petitioners thinking the few he had would be sufficient. Hoping you may give his case as favorable a consideration as is consistant.

I am
Your obt Servant
C. C. Fairleigh
